edu.iu.harp.partition

Class Table<P extends Simple>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iu.harp.partition.Table<P>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    KVTable

    public class Table<P extends Simple>
extends java.lang.Object
    The abstraction of distributed dataset. A table is assigned with an ID for reference.

      • Table

        public Table(int tableID,
             PartitionCombiner<P> combiner)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        tableID - a table is assigned with an ID which is convenient for reference. Any ID is allowed.
        combiner - the combiner used for partitions

      • addPartition

        public final PartitionStatus addPartition(Partition<P> partition)
        Add a partition into a table. If the ID of the partition already exists in this table, combine this new partition with the partition of the same ID in this table. Otherwise, insert this new partition to the table.
        Parameters:
        partition -
        Returns:
        partition status

      • insertPartition

        Parameters:
